Description: String of sixty-six tiny shells: mostly 'Ancillaria', 'Nerita' and 'Natica' shells with two 'Conus'.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Mostagedda, 463 From the grave of a child
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Brunton, ‘Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture’ (London, 1937), pl. VIII.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (70)
